I do not understand the hype on these sweatshirts. I got the orange and pink stripe. Sized up from my normal S to M in case it shrunk. It fits just like I hoped (like photo) and I did not notice any shrinking when washed and dried. It’s very soft, comfy, and I really like it!

I was so excited to get this after two weeks of waiting for it to get here. I tried it on upon opening the package. I am 5’ 8” and about 205 pounds and I ordered an XXL. I was a little disappointed to see that it came just a little above the bottom of my butt I wish it had been longer. The sleeves were nice and long and oversized, and I was happy with that. When I open the package there was a large tag that said must be washed before worn so I decided to go ahead and follow the instructions being a tall girl I always wash all of my clothes on cold never warm or hot so I proceeded to wash this sweatshirt with a couple of other sweatshirts and leggings of mine on Cold. I never dry my clothes in the dryer. I always hang them up because I’m always afraid of them shrinking I took the shirt out of the washer, stretched it a little bit and hung it up with a fan on it to dry overnight. In the morning, I tried it on And it had shrunk about 3 inches in the length and about 2 inches in the sleeves. It now comes to the top of my butt. It cannot be worn with leggings. I am so disappointed. It was absolutely so cute in the pictures and when I first tried it on now that it shrunk I’m returning it.
